Japanese:
//Text $1B83A8
#WRITE(ptr,$19120C)
革で繋ぎ合わせたガントレット。[LINE]
軽くてそこそこ丈夫。[LINE]
見習剣士の必需品。[END]
English:
//Text $1B83A8
#WRITE(ptr,$19120C)
Gauntlets strung together with leather. [LINE]
Light and reasonably strong. Essential[LINE]
for apprentice swordsmen. [END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B8338
#WRITE(ptr,$19122C)
薄い銅板で作られたガントレット。[LINE]
天地戦争時代から使われていた、[LINE]
伝統ある篭手。[END]
English:
//Text $1B8338
#WRITE(ptr,$19122C)
Gauntlets made of thin bronze.[LINE]
Traditionally used since the age[LINE]
of the Aeth'er War.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B82D0
#WRITE(ptr,$19124C)
鉄板で作られたガントレット。[LINE]
重いが堅くて丈夫。[LINE]
もっとも身近な金属。[END]
English:
//Text $1B82D0
#WRITE(ptr,$19124C)
Gauntlets made of iron, the most[LINE]
familiar of metals. Sturdy and[LINE]
tough, but heavy.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B8278
#WRITE(ptr,$19126C)
鋼板で作られたガントレット。[LINE]
騎士見習たちの愛用品。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1B8278
#WRITE(ptr,$19126C)
Gauntlets made of several[LINE]
steel plates. A favorite of[LINE]
knight apprentices.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B8218
#WRITE(ptr,$19128C)
チタン合金で強化したガントレット。[LINE]
非常に軽く、並外れた耐食性を持つ。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1B8218
#WRITE(ptr,$19128C)
Gauntlets strengthened with a[LINE]
titanium alloy. Very light and[LINE]
corrosion resistant.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B81C0
#WRITE(ptr,$1912AC)
銀細工で装飾されたガントレット。[LINE]
白い輝きが美しい。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1B81C0
#WRITE(ptr,$1912AC)
Gauntlets decorated with silverwork.[LINE]
Has a beautiful luster.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B8160
#WRITE(ptr,$1912CC)
金細工で装飾したガントレット。[LINE]
別名「豪華なガントレット」。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1B8160
#WRITE(ptr,$1912CC)
Gauntlets decorated with gold.[LINE]
Also known as the "Opulent[LINE]
Gauntlets."[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B8100
#WRITE(ptr,$1912EC)
ミスリル細工のガントレット。[LINE]
ドワーフ族の芸術作品といわれる。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1B8100
#WRITE(ptr,$1912EC)
Gauntlets decorated with[LINE]
Mithril. Considered to be[LINE]
a Dwarven work of art.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B8090
#WRITE(ptr,$19130C)
獅子の牙と火鼠の皮で加工した[LINE]
ガントレット。[LINE]
百獣の王の力が込められている。[END]
English:
//Text $1B8090
#WRITE(ptr,$19130C)
Gauntlets made with lion teeth and[LINE]
fire rat skin. Imbued with the power[LINE]
of the King of Beasts.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B5880
#WRITE(ptr,$19132C)
名工ギースの魂のこもった[LINE]
無二の傑作。[LINE]
きわめて希少価値が高い。[END]
English:
//Text $1B5880
#WRITE(ptr,$19132C)
Masterpiece imbued with the soul[LINE]
of Giese. Extremely valuable.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B8000
#WRITE(ptr,$19134C)
戦闘用に特化したガントレット。[LINE]
機能性が良いだけではなく、[LINE]
装備者の力を限界まで引き上げる。[END]
English:
//Text $1B8000
#WRITE(ptr,$19134C)
Gauntlets made specially for combat.[LINE]
Not only functional, but also has the[LINE]
power to push past one's limits.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B7F90
#WRITE(ptr,$19136C)
伝説に登場する幻想の力を秘めた[LINE]
ガントレット。口伝を書物に[LINE]
まとめた兄弟の名を冠する。[END]
English:
//Text $1B7F90
#WRITE(ptr,$19136C)
Gauntlets imbued with the hidden power[LINE]
of fantasies. Named after the brothers[LINE]
who collected oral traditions.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B7F30
#WRITE(ptr,$19138C)
革で繋ぎ合わせたグローブ。[LINE]
少し固いが丈夫で安全。[LINE]
女性の旅のお供に。[END]
English:
//Text $1B7F30
#WRITE(ptr,$19138C)
Bound together by leather. Somewhat stiff,[LINE]
but strong gloves. A regular companion of[LINE]
female travellers.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B7EC0
#WRITE(ptr,$1913AC)
まふまふの毛で作られたファーが[LINE]
ついてる可愛い手袋。[LINE]
寒くてもお洒落したいあなたへ。[END]
English:
//Text $1B7EC0
#WRITE(ptr,$1913AC)
Cute mittens made of soft fur.[LINE]
For those who are stylish but[LINE]
feel cold.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B7E48
#WRITE(ptr,$1913CC)
シルクで作られた美しいグローブ。[LINE]
滑らかな手触りに上品な刺繍。[LINE]
身に付けるだけであなたも淑女に。[END]
English:
//Text $1B7E48
#WRITE(ptr,$1913CC)
Beautiful gloves made of silk.[LINE]
Elegant and soft to the touch.[LINE]
You too can be a lady.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B7DD8
#WRITE(ptr,$1913EC)
月夜を意匠して作られたグローブ。[LINE]
聖なる月の力が宿っている。[LINE]
クロークとセットでどうぞ。[END]
English:
//Text $1B7DD8
#WRITE(ptr,$1913EC)
Gloves designed after a moonlit night.[LINE]
Endowed with the moon's holy power.[LINE]
Goes well with its cloak.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B7D68
#WRITE(ptr,$19140C)
星を意匠して作られたグローブ。[LINE]
指先はまるで流星のよう。[LINE]
クロークとセットでどうぞ。[END]
English:
//Text $1B7D68
#WRITE(ptr,$19140C)
Gloves designed after a star. Its[LINE]
fingertips look like falling stars.[LINE]
Goes well with its cloak.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B7CF8
#WRITE(ptr,$19142C)
慈愛のルーンが刺繍されたグローブ。[LINE]
触れる者全てを癒す力を、[LINE]
身に付けた者に与える。[END]
English:
//Text $1B7CF8
#WRITE(ptr,$19142C)
Gloves embroidered with the Love[LINE]
rune. Imbues one with the power[LINE]
to heal with a touch.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B7C88
#WRITE(ptr,$19144C)
原料や生成が不明なグローブ。[LINE]
見る角度により色が変化する。[LINE]
クロークとセットでどうぞ。[END]
English:
//Text $1B7C88
#WRITE(ptr,$19144C)
Gloves made from unknown materials.[LINE]
Its colors change with viewing angle.[LINE]
Goes well with its cloak.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B7C30
#WRITE(ptr,$19146C)
ミスリル細工のグローブ。[LINE]
ドワーフ族の芸術作品といわれる。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1B7C30
#WRITE(ptr,$19146C)
Gloves decorated with Mithril.[LINE]
Considered to be a Dwarven[LINE]
work of art.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B7BC0
#WRITE(ptr,$19148C)
伝承で伝わる伝説の義賊が使って[LINE]
いたグローブ。気配を絶ち相手の[LINE]
懐を掠め取る神業を得る。[END]
English:
//Text $1B7BC0
#WRITE(ptr,$19148C)
Gloves said to have been worn by[LINE]
a legendary thief. Allows one to[LINE]
pickpocket even hidden targets.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B7B50
#WRITE(ptr,$1914AC)
伝説に登場する幻想の力を秘めた[LINE]
グローブ。口伝を書物にまとめた[LINE]
兄弟の名を冠する。[END]
English:
//Text $1B7B50
#WRITE(ptr,$1914AC)
Gloves imbued with the hidden power of[LINE]
fantasies. Named after the brothers who[LINE]
collected oral traditions into a book.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B7AE8
#WRITE(ptr,$1914CC)
ストレイライズ神殿の司祭に[LINE]
与えられるネックレス。[LINE]
集中力を高める効果がある。[END]
English:
//Text $1B7AE8
#WRITE(ptr,$1914CC)
Necklace given to the priests of[LINE]
the Straylize temple. Increases[LINE]
the wearers concentration.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B7A60
#WRITE(ptr,$1914EC)
地の精霊の加護を受けたネックレス。[LINE]
揺るがぬ冷静な心を与える。[LINE]
地属性晶術のダメージがアップする。[END]
English:
//Text $1B7A60
#WRITE(ptr,$1914EC)
Necklace imbued with the Earth Spirits.[LINE]
Gives one unshakable composure.[LINE]
Increases the damage of [Sign_Earth] spells.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B79D0
#WRITE(ptr,$19150C)
風の精霊の加護を受けたネックレス。[LINE]
理想を現実へと導く行動力を与える。[LINE]
風属性晶術のダメージがアップする。[END]
English:
//Text $1B79D0
#WRITE(ptr,$19150C)
Necklace imbued with the Wind Spirits.[LINE]
Gives the drive to make dreams real.[LINE]
Increases the damage of [Sign_Wind] spells.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B7948
#WRITE(ptr,$19152C)
火の精霊の加護を受けたネックレス。[LINE]
神秘なる者の声を聞く力を与える。[LINE]
火属性晶術のダメージがアップする。[END]
English:
//Text $1B7948
#WRITE(ptr,$19152C)
Necklace imbued with the Fire Spirits.[LINE]
Makes one hear hidden voices.[LINE]
Increases the damage of [Sign_Fire] spells.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B78C8
#WRITE(ptr,$19154C)
水の精霊の加護を受けたネックレス。[LINE]
精神力をより鋭く研ぎ澄まされる。[LINE]
水属性晶術のダメージがアップする。[END]
English:
//Text $1B78C8
#WRITE(ptr,$19154C)
Necklace imbued with the Water Spirits.[LINE]
Sharpens one's willpower. Increases the[LINE]
damage of [Sign_Water] spells.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B7848
#WRITE(ptr,$19156C)
光の精霊の加護を受けたネックレス。[LINE]
心に秘めた力を増加させる。[LINE]
光属性晶術のダメージがアップする。[END]
English:
//Text $1B7848
#WRITE(ptr,$19156C)
Necklace imbued with the Light Spirits.[LINE]
Heightens one's power to keep secrets.[LINE]
Increases the damage of [Sign_Light] spells.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B77D0
#WRITE(ptr,$19158C)
大地母神の祝福を受けたネックレス。[LINE]
大いなる祝福と深い慈愛を。[LINE]
地属性晶術の詠唱時間が減少する。[END]
English:
//Text $1B77D0
#WRITE(ptr,$19158C)
Necklace imbued with the Earth Spirits and[LINE]
Goddess' blessings and love. Decreases[LINE]
the casting time of [Sign_Earth] spells.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B7750
#WRITE(ptr,$1915AC)
風の王の祝福を受けたネックレス。[LINE]
大いなる祝福と歪まぬ心を。[LINE]
風属性晶術の詠唱時間が減少する。[END]
English:
//Text $1B7750
#WRITE(ptr,$1915AC)
Necklace imbued with the Lord of Winds'[LINE]
blessing and warped heart. Decreases[LINE]
the casting time of [Sign_Wind] spells.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B76D8
#WRITE(ptr,$1915CC)
炎の女神の祝福を受けたネックレス。[LINE]
大いなる祝福と貫く意思を。[LINE]
火属性晶術の詠唱時間が減少する。[END]
English:
//Text $1B76D8
#WRITE(ptr,$1915CC)
Necklace imbued with the Fire Goddess'[LINE]
blessing and impenetrable will. Decreases [LINE]
the casting time of [Sign_Fire] spells.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B7658
#WRITE(ptr,$1915EC)
海の神の祝福を受けたネックレス。[LINE]
大いなる祝福と惑わぬ心を。[LINE]
水属性晶術の詠唱時間が減少する。[END]
English:
//Text $1B7658
#WRITE(ptr,$1915EC)
Necklace imbued with the Ocean God's[LINE]
blessing and unwavering heart. [LINE]
Decreases the casting time of [Sign_Water] spells.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B75D0
#WRITE(ptr,$19160C)
光の大神の祝福を受けたネックレス。[LINE]
大いなる祝福と永久の忠誠を。[LINE]
光属性晶術の詠唱時間が減少する。[END]
English:
//Text $1B75D0
#WRITE(ptr,$19160C)
Necklace imbued with the God of Light's[LINE]
blessing and eternal integrity. Decreases[LINE]
the casting time of [Sign_Light] spells.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B7570
#WRITE(ptr,$19162C)
1本の木材で構成された長弓。[LINE]
弓の道に進むのなら、[LINE]
まずは自分の弓作りから。[END]
English:
//Text $1B7570
#WRITE(ptr,$19162C)
Longbow made from a single piece of[LINE]
lumber. To master the art of archery,[LINE]
one must craft a bow of their own.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B7508
#WRITE(ptr,$19164C)
複数の材料と材質を合わせた長弓。[LINE]
軸がぶれず適度に柔軟。[LINE]
弓に慣れてきた狩人用。[END]
English:
//Text $1B7508
#WRITE(ptr,$19164C)
Longbow made of several materials.[LINE]
Moderately flexible. For hunters[LINE]
familiar with the use of bows.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B7498
#WRITE(ptr,$19166C)
風よりも速く、駆ける獣をも射る。[LINE]
自らが狩った獣の体の一部を[LINE]
使用して作るのが伝統。[END]
English:
//Text $1B7498
#WRITE(ptr,$19166C)
Faster than the wind, it can reach[LINE]
fleeing prey. Traditionally made[LINE]
with a part of a hunted animal.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B7428
#WRITE(ptr,$19168C)
錬金術から生まれた特殊金属の長弓。[LINE]
獲物の存在を感知すると、[LINE]
熱を持って伝えるという。[END]
English:
//Text $1B7428
#WRITE(ptr,$19168C)
Longbow made from a special[LINE]
alchemically created metal. Said to[LINE]
feel a prey's presence by its heat.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B73B8
#WRITE(ptr,$1916AC)
草原を駆ける獣よりも速く。[LINE]
天高く飛ぶ鳥よりも遠くへ。[LINE]
最高の腕を持つ狩人のための長弓。[END]
English:
//Text $1B73B8
#WRITE(ptr,$1916AC)
Faster than an animal running through the[LINE]
fields. Faster than the birds flying through[LINE]
the skies. Made for experienced hunters.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B7368
#WRITE(ptr,$1916CC)
一撃必中。[LINE]
暗殺に特化された長弓。[LINE]
音もなく放たれる死の一撃。[END]
English:
//Text $1B7368
#WRITE(ptr,$1916CC)
One hit, one kill. Longbow used[LINE]
in assassinations. Shoots death[LINE]
silently.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B7308
#WRITE(ptr,$1916EC)
その名の通り戦闘に特化した長弓。[LINE]
強度もあり、その一撃は敵の装甲を[LINE]
貫くほど。[END]
English:
//Text $1B7308
#WRITE(ptr,$1916EC)
Longbow made for use on the[LINE]
battlefield. Strong enough to[LINE]
pierce the enemy's armor.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B72A8
#WRITE(ptr,$19170C)
伝説に登場する幻想の力を秘めた[LINE]
長弓。口伝を書物にまとめた[LINE]
兄弟の名を冠する。[END]
English:
//Text $1B72A8
#WRITE(ptr,$19170C)
Longbow imbued with the hidden power of[LINE]
fantasies. Named after the brothers who[LINE]
collected oral traditions into a book.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B7248
#WRITE(ptr,$19172C)
古くから薬用植物として重宝され、[LINE]
体を温めたり、[LINE]
疲労回復などの効果がある。[END]
English:
//Text $1B7248
#WRITE(ptr,$19172C)
Used as a medicinal plant since[LINE]
ancient times, it warms the body[LINE]
and relieves fatigue.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B71E0
#WRITE(ptr,$19174C)
柄頭の形状がリングになっている[LINE]
短剣。輪に紐を通して[LINE]
投げて使うことも可能。[END]
English:
//Text $1B71E0
#WRITE(ptr,$19174C)
A dagger with a ring-shaped[LINE]
pommel. Attach a wire and[LINE]
you can throw and reel it in.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B7168
#WRITE(ptr,$19176C)
騎士達が持つ切っ先の尖った短剣。[LINE]
相手を傷つけることよりも[LINE]
儀礼的なことで使われる事が多い。[END]
English:
//Text $1B7168
#WRITE(ptr,$19176C)
A sharp dagger carried by the knights.[LINE]
It is more often used for ceremonial[LINE]
purposes than for actual combat.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B7108
#WRITE(ptr,$19178C)
柄頭が耳のような形状をした短剣。[LINE]
握りやすく、優れた貫通力を持つ。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1B7108
#WRITE(ptr,$19178C)
A dagger with an ear-shaped[LINE]
pommel. It's easy to grip and[LINE]
has great piercing power.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B7098
#WRITE(ptr,$1917AC)
二刀流剣士の必需品、左手用短剣。[LINE]
硬い刀身を持ち、[LINE]
相手の剣を受け止めることも可能。[END]
English:
//Text $1B7098
#WRITE(ptr,$1917AC)
Left-hand held dagger, a necessity for[LINE]
ambidextrous swordsmen. Has a sharp[LINE]
blade and can block enemy attacks.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B7038
#WRITE(ptr,$1917CC)
刺すことに力点を置いた短剣。[LINE]
決闘で使われる殺傷能力の高い武器。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1B7038
#WRITE(ptr,$1917CC)
A dagger made for thrusting.[LINE]
When used in a duel it can[LINE]
inflict severe bloodshed.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B6FB8
#WRITE(ptr,$1917EC)
世界中でもっとも洗練された武器。[LINE]
刃は両刃で波形にうねっている。[LINE]
身を守り、邪悪を退ける力を持つ。[END]
English:
//Text $1B6FB8
#WRITE(ptr,$1917EC)
The world's most refined weapon.[LINE]
Its double-edged blade undulates.[LINE]
Protects the user and expels evil.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B6F60
#WRITE(ptr,$19180C)
非常に高価なきのこの王様。[LINE]
傘が開ききると[LINE]
香りも味も落ちてしまう。[END]
English:
//Text $1B6F60
#WRITE(ptr,$19180C)
The utterly expensive king of mushrooms.[LINE]
Acquires a powerful taste and smell when[LINE]
its cap opens.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B6F08
#WRITE(ptr,$19182C)
『必勝』と描かれたバンダナ。[LINE]
気が引き締まり、攻撃力アップ！[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1B6F08
#WRITE(ptr,$19182C)
A "Certain Victory" bandana.[LINE]
Increases attack when worn.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B6EA8
#WRITE(ptr,$19184C)
『激烈』と描かれたバンダナ。[LINE]
熱毒を防止し、攻撃力を上昇させる。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1B6EA8
#WRITE(ptr,$19184C)
A "Fury" bandana. Protects[LINE]
wearer against poison and[LINE]
increases attack when worn.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B6E48
#WRITE(ptr,$19186C)
『堅牢』と描かれたバンダナ。[LINE]
石化を防止し、防御力を上昇させる。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1B6E48
#WRITE(ptr,$19186C)
A "Stout" bandana. Protects wearer[LINE]
against petrification and increases[LINE]
defense.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B6DF0
#WRITE(ptr,$19188C)
『天空』と描かれたバンダナ。[LINE]
麻痺を防止し、体力を上昇させる。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1B6DF0
#WRITE(ptr,$19188C)
A "Sky" bandana. Protects[LINE]
wearer against paralysis[LINE]
and increases endurance.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B6D90
#WRITE(ptr,$1918AC)
『覚醒』と描かれたバンダナ。[LINE]
睡眠を防止し、集中力を上昇させる。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1B6D90
#WRITE(ptr,$1918AC)
An "Awakening" bandana. Protects[LINE]
wearer against sleep and increases[LINE]
concentration.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B6D30
#WRITE(ptr,$1918CC)
『疾風』と描かれたバンダナ。[LINE]
衰弱を防止し、回避率を上昇させる。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1B6D30
#WRITE(ptr,$1918CC)
A "Gale" bandana. Protects[LINE]
wearer against weakness[LINE]
and increases evasion.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B6CD0
#WRITE(ptr,$1918EC)
『滅殺』と描かれたバンダナ。[LINE]
封印を防止し、命中率を上昇させる。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1B6CD0
#WRITE(ptr,$1918EC)
An "Annihilation" bandana. Protects[LINE]
wearer against seal and increases[LINE]
accuracy.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B6C80
#WRITE(ptr,$19190C)
『豪傑』と描かれたバンダナ。[LINE]
攻撃力が大幅に上昇する。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1B6C80
#WRITE(ptr,$19190C)
A "Hero" bandana. Greatly[LINE]
increases wearer's attack.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B6C10
#WRITE(ptr,$19192C)
『革命』と描かれたバンダナ。[LINE]
どんな事でも揺るがない！[LINE]
全ての状態異常を防止する。[END]
English:
//Text $1B6C10
#WRITE(ptr,$19192C)
A "Revolution" bandana. Protects[LINE]
against all ailments. "Nothing will[LINE] 
shake me!"[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B6BB0
#WRITE(ptr,$19194C)
真っ赤なシンプルなリボン。[LINE]
女の子の必需品。[LINE]
火属性耐性を付加する。[END]
English:
//Text $1B6BB0
#WRITE(ptr,$19194C)
A simple red ribbon. A necessity for[LINE]
girls. Increases fire resistance.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B6B48
#WRITE(ptr,$19196C)
水色のプリーツ状リボン。[LINE]
ちょっとおしゃまな女の子向け。[LINE]
水属性耐性を付加する。[END]
English:
//Text $1B6B48
#WRITE(ptr,$19196C)
A light blue pleated ribbon.[LINE]
Made for precocious girls.[LINE]
Increases water resistance.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B6AE0
#WRITE(ptr,$19198C)
サテン生地のオレンジリボン。[LINE]
お姉さんに憧れる女の子へ。[LINE]
地属性耐性を付加する。[END]
English:
//Text $1B6AE0
#WRITE(ptr,$19198C)
An orange satin ribbon. For girls[LINE]
who look up to ladies. Increases[LINE]
earth resistance.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B6A70
#WRITE(ptr,$1919AC)
南国ちっくな緑のリボン。[LINE]
人とは違った物をつけたい女の子向け。[LINE]
風属性耐性を付加する。[END]
English:
//Text $1B6A70
#WRITE(ptr,$1919AC)
A tropical green ribbon. For girls[LINE]
who want to become different.[LINE]
Increases wind resistance.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B6A00
#WRITE(ptr,$1919CC)
天使のような羽つきリボン。[LINE]
ワンランク上の女の子になれる！[LINE]
光属性耐性を付加する。[END]
English:
//Text $1B6A00
#WRITE(ptr,$1919CC)
Ribbon decorated with angel feathers.[LINE]
Wearing it makes a girl look classy![LINE]
Increases light resistance.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B6998
#WRITE(ptr,$1919EC)
神秘的な黒いリボン。[LINE]
大人の女性も越えたいあなたへ。[LINE]
闇属性耐性を付加する。[END]
English:
//Text $1B6998
#WRITE(ptr,$1919EC)
A mysterious black ribbon. For those[LINE]
who want to surpass adult women.[LINE]
Increases dark resistance.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B6920
#WRITE(ptr,$191A0C)
子供だけが身に付けられるリボン。[LINE]
愛と夢と希望がいっぱい。[LINE]
高ぶる気持ちでいっぱい動ける。[END]
English:
//Text $1B6920
#WRITE(ptr,$191A0C)
A ribbon for children. Filled with[LINE]
love, hopes, and dreams. Allows[LINE]
one to move excitedly.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B68B0
#WRITE(ptr,$191A2C)
大きな羽を飾りにつけた帽子。[LINE]
洒落た帽子でワンランク上の男を[LINE]
目指す。それがジョニー流。[END]
English:
//Text $1B68B0
#WRITE(ptr,$191A2C)
A hat with a large feather for decoration.[LINE]
decoration. Aiming to be classy with a[LINE]
stylish hat. That's [Johnny]'s style.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B6838
#WRITE(ptr,$191A4C)
強者のみが被ることを許される。[LINE]
被れば称賛を浴びること間違いなし。[LINE]
火属性の攻撃属性を付加する。[END]
English:
//Text $1B6838
#WRITE(ptr,$191A4C)
Only the strong are allowed to wear[LINE]
it. With it, you're sure to be admired.[LINE]
Imbues attacks with fire.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B67B8
#WRITE(ptr,$191A6C)
世界を旅する冒険家が被っていたと[LINE]
言われている帽子。放浪癖がつきます。[LINE]
地属性の攻撃属性を付加する。[END]
English:
//Text $1B67B8
#WRITE(ptr,$191A6C)
This hat is said to be worn by adventurers[LINE]
traveling the world. It gives you wanderlust.[LINE]
Imbues attacks with earth.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B6738
#WRITE(ptr,$191A8C)
老いた魔術師が、帽子が風に飛ば[LINE]
されないように作った帽子。それが幸せ。[LINE]
風属性の攻撃属性を付加する。[END]
English:
//Text $1B6738
#WRITE(ptr,$191A8C)
A sorcerer made this hat so it won't[LINE]
be blown away by the wind. That's[LINE]
happiness. Imbues attacks with wind.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B66C0
#WRITE(ptr,$191AAC)
常に謎と戦う探求者のための帽子。[LINE]
答えを導くと頭の上に何かが出る。[LINE]
水属性の攻撃属性を付加する。[END]
English:
//Text $1B66C0
#WRITE(ptr,$191AAC)
A hat for a seeker of mysteries. A sign[LINE]
pops up above your head when you find[LINE]
the answer. Imbues attacks with water.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B6648
#WRITE(ptr,$191ACC)
かつて「天使の合唱団」と呼ばれた[LINE]
聖歌隊が被っていた由緒ある帽子。[LINE]
光属性の攻撃属性を付加する。[END]
English:
//Text $1B6648
#WRITE(ptr,$191ACC)
A historic hat once worn by the[LINE]
choir known as "Angel's Choir".[LINE]
Imbues attacks with light.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B65D0
#WRITE(ptr,$191AEC)
その声は、混沌で眠る不死の王をも[LINE]
魅了する。伝説に残る詩人の帽子。[LINE]
闇属性の攻撃属性を付加する。[END]
English:
//Text $1B65D0
#WRITE(ptr,$191AEC)
The hat of a legendary poet. His voice[LINE]
enchants even the sleeping kings. Imbues[LINE]
attacks with dark.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B6560
#WRITE(ptr,$191B0C)
街を離れるため返還した[LINE]
チャンピオンベルトのレプリカ。[LINE]
また取り戻しゃーいいのよ！[END]
English:
//Text $1B6560
#WRITE(ptr,$191B0C)
A replica of the Champion's belt. He[LINE]
turned the original in when he left[LINE]
the city. We can get it back again![END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B6508
#WRITE(ptr,$191B2C)
闘技場フライ級を制覇した証。[LINE]
通常攻撃にダウン効果が少しつく。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1B6508
#WRITE(ptr,$191B2C)
Proof one has conquered the arena's[LINE]
flyweight division. Normal attacks have[LINE]
a low chance of downing foes.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B64A8
#WRITE(ptr,$191B4C)
闘技場バンタム級を制覇した証。[LINE]
通常攻撃にダウン効果がそこそこつく。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1B64A8
#WRITE(ptr,$191B4C)
Proof of having conquered the arena's[LINE]
heavyweight division. Normal attacks[LINE]
have a slight chance of downing foes.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B6448
#WRITE(ptr,$191B6C)
闘技場ライト級を制覇した証。[LINE]
通常攻撃にダウン効果がだいぶつく。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1B6448
#WRITE(ptr,$191B6C)
Proof of conquering the arena's lightweight[LINE]
division. Normal attacks have a increased[LINE]
chance of downing foes.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B63E8
#WRITE(ptr,$191B8C)
闘技場ミドル級を制覇した証。[LINE]
通常攻撃にダウン効果がけっこうつく。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1B63E8
#WRITE(ptr,$191B8C)
Proof of conquering the arena's middleweight[LINE]
division. Normal attacks have a high chance[LINE]
of downing foes.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B6388
#WRITE(ptr,$191BAC)
闘技場ヘビー級を制覇した証。[LINE]
通常攻撃にダウン効果がかなりつく。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1B6388
#WRITE(ptr,$191BAC)
Proof of conquering the arena's heavyweight[LINE]
division. Normal attacks have a significant[LINE]
chance of downing foes.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B6328
#WRITE(ptr,$191BCC)
闘技場を制覇した者に贈られる[LINE]
最強の証！[LINE]
不屈の闘志でピンチを跳ね返す！[END]
English:
//Text $1B6328
#WRITE(ptr,$191BCC)
The greatest proof for those who have[LINE]
conquered the arena! Rebound back[LINE]
when in a pinch with your spirit![END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B62D8
#WRITE(ptr,$191BEC)
セインガルド地方に生息する[LINE]
モンスターを制覇した証！[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1B62D8
#WRITE(ptr,$191BEC)
Proof you conquered all monsters[LINE]
in the Seinegald region![LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B6280
#WRITE(ptr,$191C0C)
フィッツガルド地方に生息する[LINE]
モンスターを制覇した証！[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1B6280
#WRITE(ptr,$191C0C)
Proof you conquered all monsters[LINE]
in the Fitzgald region![LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B6230
#WRITE(ptr,$191C2C)
カルバレイス地方に生息する[LINE]
モンスターを制覇した証！[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1B6230
#WRITE(ptr,$191C2C)
Proof you conquered all monsters[LINE]
in the Calvalese region![LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B61D8
#WRITE(ptr,$191C4C)
アクアヴェイル地方に生息する[LINE]
モンスターを制覇した証！[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1B61D8
#WRITE(ptr,$191C4C)
Proof you conquered all monsters[LINE]
in the Aquaveil region![LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B6188
#WRITE(ptr,$191C6C)
ファンダリア地方に生息する[LINE]
モンスターを制覇した証！[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1B6188
#WRITE(ptr,$191C6C)
Proof you conquered all monsters[LINE]
in the Phandaria region![LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B6118
#WRITE(ptr,$191C8C)
全世界のモンスターを制覇した[LINE]
チャンピオンの証！[LINE]
どんなことにも屈しなくなる。[END]
English:
//Text $1B6118
#WRITE(ptr,$191C8C)
The sign of a champion who has[LINE]
conquered every monster! You[LINE]
will never yield to any challenge.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B60B8
#WRITE(ptr,$191CAC)
砂漠では水の供給源ともなるすいか。[LINE]
昔は種も食用として扱われていたとか……[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1B60B8
#WRITE(ptr,$191CAC)
It is another source of water in the[LINE]
desert. In the past, its seeds were[LINE]
considered edible.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B6068
#WRITE(ptr,$191CCC)
鉄で作られたフライパン。[LINE]
使い込むほど味が出る。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1B6068
#WRITE(ptr,$191CCC)
A frying pan made of iron.[LINE]
The more you use it, the[LINE]
better the flavor.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B6008
#WRITE(ptr,$191CEC)
銅で作られたフライパン。[LINE]
熱伝導がすばらしい。[LINE]
料理時間が短縮されます。[END]
English:
//Text $1B6008
#WRITE(ptr,$191CEC)
A frying pan made of copper.[LINE]
It has great heat conduction[LINE]
and reduces cooking time.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B5FA0
#WRITE(ptr,$191D0C)
銀で作られたフライパン。[LINE]
白い輝きが美しい。[LINE]
焦がしてしまうのがもったいない。[END]
English:
//Text $1B5FA0
#WRITE(ptr,$191D0C)
A frying pan made of silver.[LINE]
Has a beautiful white shine.[LINE]
It's a pity it will be burned.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B5F30
#WRITE(ptr,$191D2C)
金で作られたフライパン。[LINE]
別名「豪華なフライパン」。[LINE]
これであなたも王族専属シェフ。[END]
English:
//Text $1B5F30
#WRITE(ptr,$191D2C)
A frying pan made of gold. Also known as[LINE]
the "Gorgeous Frying Pan". Now you too[LINE]
can be the royal family's personal chef.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1B5ED8
#WRITE(ptr,$191D4C)
非常に古くから栽培されている野菜。[LINE]
漬物にして食べるのが一般的。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1B5ED8
#WRITE(ptr,$191D4C)
A vegetable that has been cultivated[LINE]
for a very long time. Commonly eaten[LINE]
pickled as a side dish.[END]
